name: Beeeharth
description:
Help the Space Sheep to conquer the legendary planet Beeeharth!!!

Controls

  • Jump: any key (except ESC and ALT+F4 )
  • Jump faster, higher and unordered: spam the Jump button!

Game made for Black and White Jam!

Theme: Outer Space

Restriction: Only white and black colors 

Unlock all the different endings!

[Updated 2021 10 13]
Scaled by DeltaTime, improve visibility of obstacles, expand button area,  add instructions, reduce baaahard difficulty, add Baa sound if you click on a floating sheep at menu :P
